document_data.name: ''Gloves of the Yellow Rose''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gloves of the Yellow Rose''''' were enchanted gloves used by the [[monk]]s of [[Disciples of St. Sollars the Twice-Martyred]] from the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]].
document_data.Powers: When worn by a monk, ''Gloves of the Yellow Rose'' enhanced their attack power and, when struck, deal electricity damage to the target.
document_data.History: In late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] these gloves could often be found on the hands of monks of the Yellow Rose who traveled alongside [[paladin]]s of [[Ilmater]] as guides and companions. Many of the ''gloves of the Yellow Rose'' of various enchantment strength could be purchased from temples and merchants found in [[Neverwinter]], [[Daggerford]], and other cities along the [[Sword Coast]].
